nodes.text: The Dabi were a sentient species. They had four arms, which they could operate independently. They could also speak Galactic Basic Standard. In 40 ABY, a Dabi worked as a bartender in Zerria's Bar on the planet of Drall. When a visiting patron, the Mandalorian Mirta Gev, destroyed the speech circuit of the droid waiter Forre Musa, the bartender applauded her action, claiming the droid had been ruining business at the bar.
The Dabi were created by Karen Traviss for the novel Legacy of the Force: Bloodlines, published by Del Rey in 2006.
